name: Ghostcatcher!
description:
A Game Boy-Styled game where a man finds himself in a different world where there are ghosts in every corner. As  game goes along, he tries to remember his past and makes choices. Every choice you make affects the ending. Have fun as you play along the game, eventually learning the truth behind his past. (Experimenting with choices is encouraged)

ActionGame BoyKeyboardMove
Skip Text
InteractD-Pad
